column4: hi, I got error "configure: error: curl-7.19.2 is required", can anyone tell me what is the package for it? I've already have libcurl-dev installed
do you have curl installed .. you might have the dev's but you need the binary's too
uh, apt-get install curl ... it isn't installed by default
OK, now curl is installed, but stillt he same error "curl-7.19.2 is required"
